segment.source: Managing the UE-V 2.x Agent and Packages with Windows PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing the UE-V 2.x Agent and Packages with Windows PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Managing the UE-V 2.x Agent and Packages with Windows PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing the UE-V 2.x Agent and Packages with Windows PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: Managing the UE-V 2.x Agent and Packages with Windows PowerShell and WMI
segment.target: Managing the UE-V 2.x Agent and Packages with Windows PowerShell and WMI

segment.source: You can use Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) and Windows PowerShell to manage Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, and 2.1 SP1 Agent configuration and synchronization behavior.
segment.target: You can use Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) and Windows PowerShell to manage Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, and 2.1 SP1 Agent configuration and synchronization behavior.

segment.source: For a complete list of UE-V PowerShell cmdlets, see UE-V 2 Cmdlet Reference (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=393495).
segment.target: For a complete list of UE-V PowerShell cmdlets, see UE-V 2 Cmdlet Reference (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=393495).

segment.source: To deploy the UE-V Agent by using Windows PowerShell
segment.target: To deploy the UE-V Agent by using Windows PowerShell

segment.source: Stage the UE-V installer file in an accessible network share.
segment.target: Stage the UE-V installer file in an accessible network share.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Use AgentSetup.exe to deploy both 32-bit and 64-bit versions of the UE-V Agent.
segment.target: Use AgentSetup.exe to deploy both 32-bit and 64-bit versions of the UE-V Agent.

segment.source: Windows Installer packages, AgentSetupx86.msi and AgentSetupx64.msi, are available for each architecture.
segment.target: Windows Installer packages, AgentSetupx86.msi and AgentSetupx64.msi, are available for each architecture.

segment.source: To uninstall the UE-V Agent at a later time by using the installation file, you must use the same file type.
segment.target: To uninstall the UE-V Agent at a later time by using the installation file, you must use the same file type.

segment.source: Use one of the following Windows PowerShell commands to install the UE-V Agent.
segment.target: Use one of the following Windows PowerShell commands to install the UE-V Agent.

segment.source: To configure the UE-V Agent by using Windows PowerShell
segment.target: To configure the UE-V Agent by using Windows PowerShell

segment.source: Open a Windows PowerShell window.
segment.target: Open a Windows PowerShell window.

segment.source: To manage computer settings that affect all users of the computer by using the Computer parameter, open the window with an account that has administrator rights.
segment.target: To manage computer settings that affect all users of the computer by using the Computer parameter, open the window with an account that has administrator rights.

segment.source: Use the following Windows PowerShell commands to configure the agent.
segment.target: Use the following Windows PowerShell commands to configure the agent.

segment.source: Windows PowerShell command
segment.target: Windows PowerShell command

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Gets the effective UE-V Agent settings.
segment.target: Gets the effective UE-V Agent settings.

segment.source: User-specific settings have precedence over the computer settings.
segment.target: User-specific settings have precedence over the computer settings.

segment.source: Gets the UE-V Agent settings values for the current user only.
segment.target: Gets the UE-V Agent settings values for the current user only.

segment.source: Gets the UE-V Agent configuration settings values for all users on the computer.
segment.target: Gets the UE-V Agent configuration settings values for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Gets the details for each configuration setting.
segment.target: Gets the details for each configuration setting.

segment.source: Displays where the setting is configured or if it uses the default value.
segment.target: Displays where the setting is configured or if it uses the default value.

segment.source: Is displayed if the current setting is valid.
segment.target: Is displayed if the current setting is valid.

segment.source: Sets the text that is displayed in the Company Settings Center for the help link.
segment.target: Sets the text that is displayed in the Company Settings Center for the help link.

segment.source: Sets the URL of the link in the Company Settings Center for the help link.
segment.target: Sets the URL of the link in the Company Settings Center for the help link.

segment.source: Any URL protocol can be used.
segment.target: Any URL protocol can be used.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V Agent to not synchronize any Windows apps for all users on the computer.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V Agent to not synchronize any Windows apps for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V Agent to not synchronize any Windows apps for the current computer user.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V Agent to not synchronize any Windows apps for the current computer user.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V Agent to display notification the first time the agent runs for all users on the computer.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V Agent to display notification the first time the agent runs for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V Agent to not display notification the first time that the agent runs for all users on the computer.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V Agent to not display notification the first time that the agent runs for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V Agent to notify all users on the computer when settings synchronization is delayed.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V Agent to notify all users on the computer when settings synchronization is delayed.

segment.source: Use the DisableSettingsImportNotify parameter to disable notification.
segment.target: Use the DisableSettingsImportNotify parameter to disable notification.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V Agent to notify the current user when settings synchronization is delayed.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V Agent to notify the current user when settings synchronization is delayed.

segment.source: Use the DisableSettingsImportNotify parameter to disable notification.
segment.target: Use the DisableSettingsImportNotify parameter to disable notification.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V Agent to synchronize all Windows apps that are not explicitly disabled by the Windows app list for all users of the computer.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V Agent to synchronize all Windows apps that are not explicitly disabled by the Windows app list for all users of the computer.

segment.source: For more information, see Get-UevAppxPackage in Managing UE-V 2.x Settings Location Templates Using Windows PowerShell and WMI.
segment.target: For more information, see Get-UevAppxPackage in Managing UE-V 2.x Settings Location Templates Using Windows PowerShell and WMI.

segment.source: Use the DisableSyncUnlistedWindows8Apps parameter to configure the UE-V Agent to synchronize only Windows apps that are explicitly enabled by the Windows App List.
segment.target: Use the DisableSyncUnlistedWindows8Apps parameter to configure the UE-V Agent to synchronize only Windows apps that are explicitly enabled by the Windows App List.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V Agent to synchronize all Windows apps that are not explicitly disabled by the Windows app list for the current user on the computer.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V Agent to synchronize all Windows apps that are not explicitly disabled by the Windows app list for the current user on the computer.

segment.source: For more information, see Get-UevAppxPackage in Managing UE-V 2.x Settings Location Templates Using Windows PowerShell and WMI.
segment.target: For more information, see Get-UevAppxPackage in Managing UE-V 2.x Settings Location Templates Using Windows PowerShell and WMI.

segment.source: Use the DisableSyncUnlistedWindows8Apps parameter to configure the UE-V Agent to synchronize only Windows apps that are explicitly enabled by the Windows App List.
segment.target: Use the DisableSyncUnlistedWindows8Apps parameter to configure the UE-V Agent to synchronize only Windows apps that are explicitly enabled by the Windows App List.

segment.source: Disables UE-V for all the users on the computer.
segment.target: Disables UE-V for all the users on the computer.

segment.source: Use the EnableSync parameter to enable or re-enable.
segment.target: Use the EnableSync parameter to enable or re-enable.

segment.source: Disables UE-V for the current user on the computer.
segment.target: Disables UE-V for the current user on the computer.

segment.source: Use the EnableSync parameter to enable or re-enable.
segment.target: Use the EnableSync parameter to enable or re-enable.

segment.source: Enables the UE-V icon in the notification area for all users of the computer.
segment.target: Enables the UE-V icon in the notification area for all users of the computer.

segment.source: Use the DisableTrayIcon parameter to disable the icon.
segment.target: Use the DisableTrayIcon parameter to disable the icon.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V agent to report when a settings package file size reaches the defined threshold for all users on the computer.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V agent to report when a settings package file size reaches the defined threshold for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Sets the threshold package size in bytes.
segment.target: Sets the threshold package size in bytes.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V agent to report when a settings package file size reaches the defined threshold.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V agent to report when a settings package file size reaches the defined threshold.

segment.source: Sets the package size warning threshold for the current user.
segment.target: Sets the package size warning threshold for the current user.

segment.source: Specifies the time in seconds before the user is notified for all users of the computer
segment.target: Specifies the time in seconds before the user is notified for all users of the computer

segment.source: Specifies the time in seconds before notification for the current user is sent.
segment.target: Specifies the time in seconds before notification for the current user is sent.

segment.source: Defines a per-computer settings storage location for all users of the computer.
segment.target: Defines a per-computer settings storage location for all users of the computer.

segment.source: Defines a per-user settings storage location.
segment.target: Defines a per-user settings storage location.

segment.source: Sets the settings template catalog path for all users of the computer.
segment.target: Sets the settings template catalog path for all users of the computer.

segment.source: Sets the synchronization method for all users of the computer: SyncProvider or None.
segment.target: Sets the synchronization method for all users of the computer: SyncProvider or None.

segment.source: Sets the synchronization method for the current user: SyncProvider or None.
segment.target: Sets the synchronization method for the current user: SyncProvider or None.

segment.source: Sets the synchronization time-out in milliseconds for all users of the computer
segment.target: Sets the synchronization time-out in milliseconds for all users of the computer

segment.source: Set the synchronization time-out for the current user.
segment.target: Set the synchronization time-out for the current user.

segment.source: Clears the specified setting for all users on the computer.
segment.target: Clears the specified setting for all users on the computer.

segment.source: Clears the specified setting for the current user only.
segment.target: Clears the specified setting for the current user only.

segment.source: Exports the UE-V computer configuration to a settings migration file.
segment.target: Exports the UE-V computer configuration to a settings migration file.

segment.source: The file name extension must be .uev.
segment.target: The file name extension must be .uev.

segment.source: The cmdlet exports all UE-V Agent settings that are configurable with the Computer parameter.
segment.target: The cmdlet exports all UE-V Agent settings that are configurable with the Computer parameter.

segment.source: Imports the UE-V computer configuration from a settings migration file.
segment.target: Imports the UE-V computer configuration from a settings migration file.

segment.source: The file name extension must be .uev.
segment.target: The file name extension must be .uev.

segment.source: To export UE-V package settings and repair UE-V templates by using Windows PowerShell
segment.target: To export UE-V package settings and repair UE-V templates by using Windows PowerShell

segment.source: Open a Windows PowerShell window as an administrator.
segment.target: Open a Windows PowerShell window as an administrator.

segment.source: Use the following Windows PowerShell commands to configure the agent.
segment.target: Use the following Windows PowerShell commands to configure the agent.

segment.source: Windows PowerShell command
segment.target: Windows PowerShell command

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Export-UevPackage MicrosoftCalculator6.pkgx
segment.target: Export-UevPackage MicrosoftCalculator6.pkgx

segment.source: Extracts the settings from a Microsoft Calculator package file and converts them into a human-readable format in XML.
segment.target: Extracts the settings from a Microsoft Calculator package file and converts them into a human-readable format in XML.

segment.source: Repair-UevTemplateIndex
segment.target: Repair-UevTemplateIndex

segment.source: Repairs the index of the UE-V settings location templates.
segment.target: Repairs the index of the UE-V settings location templates.

segment.source: To configure the UE-V Agent by using WMI
segment.target: To configure the UE-V Agent by using WMI

segment.source: User Experience Virtualization provides the following set of WMI commands.
segment.target: User Experience Virtualization provides the following set of WMI commands.

segment.source: Administrators can use this interface to configure the UE-V agent at the command line and automate typical configuration tasks.
segment.target: Administrators can use this interface to configure the UE-V agent at the command line and automate typical configuration tasks.

segment.source: Use an account with administrator rights to open a Windows PowerShell window.
segment.target: Use an account with administrator rights to open a Windows PowerShell window.

segment.source: Use the following WMI commands to configure the agent.
segment.target: Use the following WMI commands to configure the agent.

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Displays the active UE-V Agent settings.
segment.target: Displays the active UE-V Agent settings.

segment.source: User-specific settings have precedence over the computer settings.
segment.target: User-specific settings have precedence over the computer settings.

segment.source: Displays the UE-V Agent configuration that is defined for a user.
segment.target: Displays the UE-V Agent configuration that is defined for a user.

segment.source: Displays the UE-V Agent configuration that is defined for a computer.
segment.target: Displays the UE-V Agent configuration that is defined for a computer.

segment.source: Displays the details for each configuration item.
segment.target: Displays the details for each configuration item.

segment.source: $config.Put()
segment.target: $config.Put()

segment.source: Defines a per-computer settings storage location.
segment.target: Defines a per-computer settings storage location.

segment.source: Defines a per-user settings storage location.
segment.target: Defines a per-user settings storage location.

segment.source: Sets the synchronization time-out in milliseconds for all users of the computer.
segment.target: Sets the synchronization time-out in milliseconds for all users of the computer.

segment.source: Configures the UE-V Agent to report when a settings package file size reaches a defined threshold.
segment.target: Configures the UE-V Agent to report when a settings package file size reaches a defined threshold.

segment.source: Set the threshold package file size in bytes for all users of the computer.
segment.target: Set the threshold package file size in bytes for all users of the computer.

segment.source: Sets the synchronization method for all users of the computer: SyncProvider or None.
segment.target: Sets the synchronization method for all users of the computer: SyncProvider or None.

segment.source: To enable a specific per-computer setting, clear the setting, and use $null as the setting value.
segment.target: To enable a specific per-computer setting, clear the setting, and use $null as the setting value.

segment.source: Use UserConfiguration for per-user settings.
segment.target: Use UserConfiguration for per-user settings.

segment.source: To disable a specific per-computer setting, clear the setting, and use $null as the setting value.
segment.target: To disable a specific per-computer setting, clear the setting, and use $null as the setting value.

segment.source: Use User Configuration for per-user settings.
segment.target: Use User Configuration for per-user settings.

segment.source: Updates a specific per-computer setting.
segment.target: Updates a specific per-computer setting.

segment.source: To clear the setting, use $null as the setting value.
segment.target: To clear the setting, use $null as the setting value.

segment.source: $config.setting namesetting value
segment.target: $config.setting namesetting value

segment.source: Updates a specific per-user setting for all users of the computer.
segment.target: Updates a specific per-user setting for all users of the computer.

segment.source: To clear the setting, use $null as the setting value.
segment.target: To clear the setting, use $null as the setting value.

segment.source: Upon configuration of the UE-V Agent with WMI and Windows PowerShell, the defined configuration is stored in the registry in the following locations.
segment.target: Upon configuration of the UE-V Agent with WMI and Windows PowerShell, the defined configuration is stored in the registry in the following locations.

segment.source: To export UE-V package settings and repair UE-V templates by using WMI
segment.target: To export UE-V package settings and repair UE-V templates by using WMI

segment.source: UE-V provides the following set of WMI commands.
segment.target: UE-V provides the following set of WMI commands.

segment.source: Administrators can use this interface to export a package or repair UE-V templates.
segment.target: Administrators can use this interface to export a package or repair UE-V templates.

segment.source: Use the following WMI commands.
segment.target: Use the following WMI commands.

segment.source: WMI command
segment.target: WMI command

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Extracts the settings from a package file and converts them into a human-readable format in XML.
segment.target: Extracts the settings from a package file and converts them into a human-readable format in XML.

segment.source: Repairs the index of the UE-V settings location templates.
segment.target: Repairs the index of the UE-V settings location templates.

segment.source: Must be run as administrator.
segment.target: Must be run as administrator.
